buildCommand: npm install --legacy-peer-deps && EXPO_NO_METRO_LAZY=1 NODE_ENV=production npx expo export:web --no-minify

headers.value: default-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval' data: blob:; script-src * 'unsafe-inline' 'unsafe-eval'; connect-src * 'unsafe-inline'; img-src * data: blob: 'unsafe-inline'; frame-src *; style-src * 'unsafe-inline';
